title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.3 - Terms and conditions of travel and fare media
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.3 - Terms and conditions of travel and fare media

State Regulations

Fares for travel via the authorities' facilities may from
time-to-time be revised by the board of the Metropolitan Transportation

Authority. The purchase of a fare for travel subjects the purchaser to the
terms and conditions for travel via the facility for which transportation is
purchased. The purchase of fare media subjects the purchaser to the terms and
conditions relating to the use of such fare media. All such terms and
conditions, which include procedures for the redemption of unused fare media, are available by writing to the appropriate authority at the address listed in
section
1003.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1003.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
